Title: Heroes
Plot: Carrie must put aside memories of her sister's death to help a young murder witness lead the police to a killer.
GuestStars: Victoria Leigh, Haley Murphy, Deanna Dunagan, Samira Wiley, Kyle Beltran, Catherine Wolf, Annie Parisse, Kyle Catlett, Mike Houston, Danielle Skraastad, Madison Arnold, Khari Wyatt, David Costabile, Che Ayende, Wa
